mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUS_RCM_CARD (id,CERT_NUM,NAME,SO_CARD_NUM,BANK_ACCOUNT,BANK_NAME,CARDSN,STATUS,GRANT_TIME,GRANT_USER_ID,GRANT_NET_TYPE, GRANT_NET_ID,BOX_ID,CARD_ID,ADD_USERNO,ADD_DATE,MOD_USERNO,MOD_DATE,RETEN_TIME,REASON,OTHER_REASON, REGIS_STATUS,orgaddress,phone,orgid,ADDUSER,make_card_time) VALUES (SEQ_RCM_CARD_ID.nextval,#{sfzh},#{xm},#{sbkh},#{bankAccount},#{bankName},#{cardSn},#{status},#{grantTime},#{grantUserId},#{grantNetType}, #{getGrantNetId},#{boxId},#{cardId},#{addUserNo},sysdate,#{modUserNo},#{modDate},to_date(#{retenTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{reason},#{otherReason}, #{regisStatus},#{orgName},#{phone},#{orgId},#{adduser},to_date(#{makeCardTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))

mapper.update: UPDATE BUS_RCM_BOX SET now_count=now_count+1,count=count+1 WHERE ID=#{boxId}

UPDATE BUS_RCM_CARD SET MOD_DATE=sysdate, REGIS_STATUS=#{regisStatus},STATUS=#{status} WHERE SO_CARD_NUM=#{sbkh} and CERT_NUM=#{sfzh}
update bus_rcm_card set CARDSN=CARDSN-1 where BOX_ID=#{boxId} and REGIS_STATUS='1' and CARDSN > #{cardsn}
mapper.select: select * from (select aa.*, rownum rn from (select h.now_count, c.CARDSN as cardsn, x.BINNO as binNo, x.id as xid, h.bin_id as binId, c.box_id as boxId, x.count as xcount, h.boxno, h.count as hcount,h.boxsn from bus_rcm_card c left join bus_rcm_box h on c.box_id = h.id left join bus_rcm_bin x on x.id = h.bin_id where c.ORGADDRESS = #{orgName} and batchno IS NULL and c.regis_status = 1 order by to_number(x.binno) desc, to_number(h.boxno) desc, to_number(c.cardsn) desc) aa) where rn = 1
